// tesing SB #1
//assuming x6 = 34
1111111_00110_00110_000_01110_0100011//SB x6, -18(x6)
//check that location 16 = 34
//passed

// tesing SB #2
001010111100_00000_000_01011_0010011//ADDI x11, x0, 700
0000000_01011_00000_000_10100_0100011//SB x11, 20(x0)
//check that location 20 = 188
//passed

// testing SLT, SLTU, LUI #3
11111111111111111111_01100_0110111//LUI x12, 745322
//check x12 = 4294963200
0000000_01100_00000_010_01101_0110011//STL x13, x0, x12
//check x13 = 1
0000000_01100_00000_011_01101_0110011//STLU x13, x0, x12
//check x13 = 0
//passed
